hadiths.text: It was narrated from Bahz bin Hakim, from his father, that his grandfather said:“I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: ‘You complete seventy nations, of which you are the best and dearest to Allah.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب صِفَةِ أُمَّةِ مُحَمَّدٍ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: Description of the Nation of Muhammad (ﷺ)
